title: Brand value of Reebok 2012 to 2017
yAxis: Brand value in billion U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Brand value in billion U.S. dollars has decreased over the Year.
Brand value in billion U.S. dollars is slightly decreasing from 2013 to 2014.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2013 and 2014.
Maximum Brand value in billion U.S. dollars, about 1.1 was reported at Year 2013
Minimum Brand value in billion U.S. dollars about 0.88 was reached at Year 2014
